## Source: amazon-inspector (242fbf21e70f13fac07ad9415ae43d91bc17823a931c07c5143ae7f7119a2b24)
The package create-response was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b8722abdd0b5d5d250eaab2906135a9b8678690501e522f8d6b9fe267ffdf900)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'create-response' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
